jql-function.name: Linked Issues From Filter Function
jql-function.description: Returns issues linked by a specified relation with those from a specified saved filter.

jql-function.name: Linked Issues From Query
jql-function.description: Returns issues linked by a specified relation with those from a provided jql subquery.

jql-function.name: Subtask From Filter Function
jql-function.description: Returns subtasks of issues returned by a specified saved filter.

jql-function.name: Subtasks From Query
jql-function.description: Returns subtasks of issues returned by a specified jql subquery.

jql-function.name: Parent Issues From Filter Function
jql-function.description: Returns parent issses of issues returned by a specified saved filter.

jql-function.name: Parent Issues From Query
jql-function.description: Returns parent issues of issues returned by a specified jql subquery.
